src:
Terlibat Komplotan Curanmor di Kos-kosan di Jakbar, Seorang Wanita Ditangkap
04 Nov 2019, 21:42 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - Polisi menangkap komplotan pencurian motor di kos-kosan di kawasan Tamansari, Jakarta Barat. Dari 6 pelaku yang ditangkap, salah satu pelaku diketahui merupakan seorang perempuan berinisial DO (24).
Selain DO, polisi juga menangkap 5 pelaku lainnya, yakni AS (22), AD (17), RZL (25), AGS (20) dan A (23). Mereka ditangkap di sebuah hotel.
"Posisi mereka untuk pemetik atau eksekutor dan juga untuk yang perempuan ini berinisial DO tugasnya untuk mengawasi di lingkungan saat mereka melakukan aksi kejahatan," kata Kapolsek Tamansari AKBP Ruly Indra kepada wartawan di kantornya, Tamansari, Jakarta Barat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Ruly menyebut, pihaknya terpaksa menembak 2 orang pelaku karena melawan saat hendak ditangkap. Kedua pelaku ditembak di bagian betisnya.
"Pada saat yang bersangkutan dilakukan upaya-upaya penangkapan, terjadi upaya perlawanan hingga dilakukan tindakan tegas dan terukur terhadap 2 orang pelaku," kata .
Salah satu pelaku lainnya, AS diketahui merupakan residivis dalam kasus serupa. Mereka diduga telah melakukan kejahatan di 20 lokasi di kawasan Jakarta Barat, Jakarta Pusat hingga Tangerang.
"Salah satu dari pelaku ini diketahui seorang residivis yang bersangkutan sudah pernah menjalani proses hukuman penjara di salah satu lembaga permasyarakatan yang ada di Tangerang dan mendapat hukuman kurang lebih 2 tahun penjara. Kemudian di tahun 2018, yang bersangkutan melancarkan aksi lagi bersama dengan kelompoknya dan tadi yang sudah disebutkan terdapat 20 TKP yang tadi disebutkan di daerah Tangerang khusunya, kemudian di Jakarta Barat dan di wilayah Jakarta Pusat," jelasnya.
Saat ditangkap polisi, para pelaku ini juga kedapatan membawa senjata api ilegal. Senjata api rakitan itu dibeli Rp 5 juta secara patungan.
"Dibeli secara ilegal oleh yang bersangkutan, ini paling senjata api rakitan. Ini tidak ada yang resmi semuanya seharga Rp 5 juta dan membelinya secara patungan. Jadi memang sudah dipersiapkan sebelumnya pada saat mereka melancarkan aksinya agar berusaha menghalang-halangi atau membantu," sambungnya.
Dalam kasus ini polisi menyita barang bukti berupa senjata api rakitan jenis revolver berganggang kayu warna cokelat, 2 butir peluru tajam kaliber 9 mm, 1 buah kunci, 2 buah ganggang kunci Letter T, 2 buah anak kunci letter T, 1 buah kunci magnet.
Atas tindakan itu, para pelaku dijerat pasal 363 KUHP tentang pencurian dan pemberatan dengan ancaman hukuman 9 tahun penjara. Kemudian dengan kepemilikan senjata api ilegal diancam dengan pasal 1 ayat (1) UU darurat nomor 12 tahun 1951 dengan ancaman pidana maksimal 20 tahun penjara. Para tersangka kini ditahan di Polsek Tamansari.

(mea/mea)
text:
Involved Plot of Curanmor in Kos-kosan in West Jakarta, A Woman Arrested
Nov 04 2019, 21:42 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - Police arrested a motorcycle theft gang at a boarding house in the Tamansari area, West Jakarta. Of the 6 perpetrators arrested, one of the perpetrators is known to be a woman with the initial DO (24).
In addition to DO, the police also arrested five other perpetrators, namely the US (22), AD (17), RZL (25), AGS (20) and A (23). They were arrested at a hotel.
"Their position is for pickers or executors and also for these women whose initial DO is their duty to supervise in the environment when they commit a crime," said Kapsek Tamansari AKBP Ruly Indra told reporters in his office, Tamansari, West Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019) ).
Ruly said, it was forced to shoot two perpetrators because they resisted when they were about to be arrested. Both perpetrators were shot in the calf.
"When the arrest was concerned, efforts were made to resist until firm and measured actions were taken against the two perpetrators," he said.
One other actor, the US is known to be a recidivist in a similar case. They are suspected of having committed crimes in 20 locations in the area of West Jakarta, Central Jakarta to Tangerang.
"One of these perpetrators is known to be a recidivist in question who had already undergone a prison sentence in one of the penitentiary in Tangerang and received a sentence of approximately 2 years in prison. Then in 2018, the relevant party launched another action together with his group and earlier "There are already 20 TKPs mentioned earlier in Tangerang, especially in West Jakarta and Central Jakarta," he explained.
When arrested by the police, the perpetrators were also found to be carrying illegal firearms. The homemade firearms were bought for Rp.5 million jointly.
"Purchased illegally by the person concerned, this is most homemade firearms. None of them are officially worth IDR 5 million and buy them jointly. So it was prepared beforehand when they launched their action to try to obstruct or help," he continued.
In this case the police confiscated evidence in the form of a firearm assembled type of brown wooden algae revolver, 2 bullets of 9 mm caliber, 1 key, 2 Letter T key algae, 2 letter T key children, 1 magnetic key.
For this action, the perpetrators were charged under Article 363 of the Criminal Code regarding theft and weighting with the threat of a sentence of 9 years in prison. Then with the possession of illegal firearms threatened with article 1 paragraph (1) of the emergency law number 12 of 1951 with a maximum criminal threat of 20 years in prison. The suspects are now being held at the Tamansari Police Station.

(mea / mea)
